Text:
I can't wait to hear this.  I have this on cassette and wore it out!  I've been stuck at 98.6 (in fact there are 5 of us all stuck at the same point) for a week...can we get another seed?  CK, are you still out there??  We need your help.  Thanks for the upload and I hope we can get this completed!!
Later, Scheu.

It's really cool that you upload old but great stuff but can you please reseed for a while, we are 11 persons who are stuck at 98.6 % and It's only 1.25 mb left.

thank you

Could the original uploader please reseed?  The "seed" shown in the torrent is firewalled and cannot provide the final 1.4% needed by all who are attempting to complete this d/l.  Everyone is still stuck at 98.6...
Thanks, Scheu

Well, this one seems dead.  I went over here:
http://isohunt.com/torrent_details/29532432/Omen+Battle+Cry?tab=summary
and now have the album already d/l'ed.  I was able to go in to my client and select this album to come down first and then just turn all the others off.  Only took me about 1.5 hours to complete.  Pretty sweet after waiting like 2 months for this one to complete...
This is such a great album, many thanks for this up....
